entry.title: 2024 Safe Bets: Saeph - _Verdant_
entry.content:
https://saeph.bandcamp.com/album/verdant

Listening to this album does make me feel alive-- alive because I can hear the influences from Porter Robinson and Madeon, from chiptunes to blasted out VHS copies of anime series you've never remembered the title of recovered from a friends of the library table sale. Listen to this album if you're a little goblin in the forest in an RPG Maker game

Tagged: #2024, #safe bets
